You plan to visit 5 European cities for 18 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 6 days in Athens. You are going to attend a wedding in Athens between day 1 and day 6. You plan to stay in Riga for 3 days. You plan to stay in London for 7 days. From day 6 to day 12, there is an annual show you want to attend in London. You plan to stay in Geneva for 4 days. You want to spend 2 days in Paris.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Athens and Geneva, from Athens to Riga, London and Paris, Athens and Paris, Paris and Riga, London and Geneva, Geneva and Paris, Athens and London.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 18 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
